# ::snt Raj bjp ka h bete,kab tak congress ko kosta rahga, congress wale toh khub dawai oxygen cylinder baat rahe h yaha tak ki bjp k logo ko bhi bacha rahe h
(a / and
      :op1 (b / bjp
            :mod (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Raj"))
            :mod (b2 / bete))
      :op2 (k / kab
            :mod (t / tak))
      :op3 (k2 / kab
            :mod (c2 / congress)
            :mod (k3 / kosta
                  :mod (r / rahga)))
      :op4 (w / wale-00
            :ARG1 c2
            :mod (t2 / toh
                  :op1 (h / hub)))
      :op5 (d / dawai
            :mod (c3 / cylinder
                  :mod (o / oxygen)))
      :op6 (s / string-entity
            :value "bjp_1"
            :mod s
            :value " logo"
            :op7-of a)
      :value "bhi bacha rahe h")
